citations.narrative:
A calf and a miniature horse were being housed with rabbits in the same primary enclosure. Housing rabbits with other
species may result in injury and harm to the rabbits. Rabbits shall not be housed in the same primary enclosure with any
other species of animals unless required for scientific reasons.
Correct by 12/12/25. Corrected at the time of inspection,
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
3.58(a) 
   
Classification and separation. 
A calf and a miniature horse were being housed with rabbits in the same primary enclosure. Housing rabbits with other 
species may result in injury and harm to the rabbits. Rabbits shall not be housed in the same primary enclosure with any 
other species of animals unless required for scientific reasons.  
Correct by 12/12/25. Corrected at the time of inspection, 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
